entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is described as walking over to the fireside and staring at the Firebolt.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as receiving a broomstick called the Firebolt.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned alongside Harry Potter looking around at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as informing Professor McGonagall that Harry has received the Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is a broomstick sent to Harry Potter. It is described by Professor McGonagall as being examined carefully from handle to twig-ends.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall examines the Firebolt carefully from handle to twig-ends.
Harry Potter is mentioned as receiving the Firebolt, implying that he owns it.
Professor McGonagall takes the Firebolt from Harry Potter.
